name: UNNotificationAttachment
desc: A media file associated with a notification.

items.name: init(identifier: String, url: URL, options: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates an attachment object from the specified file and options.

items.name: let UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsTypeHintKey: String
items.desc: A hint about an attachment’s file type.

items.name: let UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailHiddenKey: String
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the system hides the attachment’s thumbnail.

items.name: let UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailClippingRectKey: String
items.desc: The clipping rectangle for a thumbnail image.

items.name: let UNNotificationAttachmentOptionsThumbnailTimeKey: String
items.desc: The frame number of an animation to use as a thumbnail image.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for the attachment.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of the file for this attachment.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: The UTI type of the attachment.
